A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You know\, the movie was probably the best star wars movie on individual terms. My problem is that it really ruined the Star Wars Legacy. I fundamentally disagree with everything Rian Johnson believed Luke was after Return of The Jedi. It was just a shame. Awful movie for the die hard fans\, great movie for the new fans or casual fans. Being a die hard fan myself\, I simply can't give this movie a good rating. So sad :(
